name: The 3rd International Conference on Life Sciences and Biological Engineering
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), The International Conference on Life Sciences and Biological Engineering (TLSBE) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Life Sciences and Biological Engineering. 2018 TLSBE will take place from April 26-28, 2018 in Macau. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://www.tlsbe.org or contact: tlsbe@tlsbe.org
